DESCRIPTION: Affected by buffs and debuffs that affect attacks: Strength, Vulnerable, Weakened, Thorns, Lust, Pen Nib, ....
Permanently remove this card from your deck (not just this combat).
Slowed creatures take 10% more damage from attacks per card already played this turn.
You have Advantage if you have 5 or more cards in hand.
Momentum improves Attack Damage and Block gained from cards. Lose half whenever you play a card that deals Damage or gains Block.
Unplayable unless you have your Titan deployed. Armaments are always Ethereal, and Exhaust when played.
When drawn after playing a card on your turn, reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Engage effects trigger if this card is the first card played this turn.
When depleted, your Titan is destroyed. Any excess damage your Titan receives is dealt to you.
The next time you would take damage, reduce this by 1 and the damage is dealt to your Titan's Shields instead.
If you have a Titan, the effects of this card will happen immediately. If you don't, it will happen the next time you deploy it.
